block.p: Sarah Jane Dietche, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Paul C. Dietche of New York, was married yesterday to Nels Hansen Fugelsang, a son of Mr. and Mrs. George N. Fugelsang of Greenwich, Conn. The Rev. Stan Moseley performed the ceremony at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Thomas More in New York.
The couple graduated from Hamilton College.

Sarah Jane Dietche, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Paul C. Dietche of New York, was married yesterday to Nels Hansen Fugelsang, a son of Mr. and Mrs. George N. Fugelsang of Greenwich, Conn. The Rev. Stan Moseley performed the ceremony at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Thomas More in New York.
The couple graduated from Hamilton College.

Mrs. Fugelsang, 27, is a human resources specialist in the New York office of Andersen Consulting. Her father, who is retired, is a founder and the former president of Dietche & Field Advisers, an investment management firm in New York.

Mr. Fugelsang, 30, is an account executive in bond sales at First Institutional Securities in West Paterson, N.J. His father, who works in New York, is the chief executive of the North American branch of Dresdner Kleinwort Benson, the investment bank.
